#this file is automatically generated 

ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DUSE_QT4)

FIND_PACKAGE(osgQt)
FIND_PACKAGE(osgText)
FIND_PACKAGE(Qt5Widgets REQUIRED QT5OPENGL)
FIND_PACKAGE(Qt5OpenGL REQUIRED)


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${OSGQT_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${OSGQT_LIBRARY_DIR})
LINK_LIBRARIES( ${OSGQT_LIBRARIES} )

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${osgText_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${osgText_LIBRARY_DIR})
LINK_LIBRARIES( ${osgText_LIBRARIES} )

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${Qt5Widgets_INCLUDE_DIRS})
LINK_DIRECTORIES(${Qt5Widgets_LIBRARY_DIR})
LINK_LIBRARIES(${Qt5Widgets_LIBRARIES})


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${Qt5OpenGL_INCLUDE_DIR})
MESSAGE( STATUS  "Qt5OpenGL_dir: ${Qt5OpenGL_INCLUDE_DIRS}" )
MESSAGE( STATUS  "Qt5Widgets_INCLUDE_DIR: ${Qt5Widgets_INCLUDE_DIRS}" )
#INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES("D:\\Qt\\Qt5.6.1\\5.6\\msvc2015_64\\include\\QtOpenGL")
LINK_DIRECTORIES(${Qt5OpenGL_LIBRARY_DIR})
LINK_LIBRARIES(${Qt5OpenGL_LIBRARIES})

SET(TARGET_SRC osgqfont.cpp )
SET(TARGET_ADDED_LIBRARIES osgQt osgText)
IF ( NOT Qt5Widgets_FOUND )
    INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES( ${QT_INCLUDE_DIR} ${QT_QTCORE_INCLUDE_DIR} ${QT_QTGUI_INCLUDE_DIR} ${QT_QTOPENGL_INCLUDE_DIR} )
    SET(TARGET_EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES ${QT_QTCORE_LIBRARY_RELEASE} ${QT_QTGUI_LIBRARY_RELEASE} ${QT_QTOPENGL_LIBRARY_RELEASE} )
ENDIF()

#### end var setup  ###
SET ( EXAMPLE_NAME osgqfont )
ADD_EXECUTABLE(${EXAMPLE_NAME} ${TARGET_SRC})

IF ( Qt5Widgets_FOUND )
   # qt5_use_modules( example_${EXAMPLE_NAME} Widgets OpenGL )
ENDIF( Qt5Widgets_FOUND )

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${EXAMPLE_NAME} PROPERTIES FOLDER "QtApp")
